text:
I've reported this bug before but it was never resolved. The short of it is that I'm occasionally seeing Apache using nearly 100% CPU while running in foward proxy mode.  I have made several backtraces at short intervals if anyone would like to see them. strace shows nothing interesting but I did notice that the number of threads seems to vary wildly within the high-utilization process. This is not the case in a normal Apache process.

Anyway, I would really appreciate some help with this issue. Even some reasonable advice as to what I can do to debug this myself would be great. That said, please keep in mind that I'm running in a production environment so the amount of "expensive" debugging that I can do is limited.

Thanks again in advance for your help.
creator: pbelau1@yahoo.com

text:
Please do not open a new report but follow up the old one (44381) instead. It is still in status new and provide new information there. Thus I mark this bug as closed and follow up there.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 44381 ***
creator: rpluem@apache.org
